post.body: Hello ZeroMe! Joining in from my Raspberry Pi 4!!!

comment.body: @Realjohndoe: I installed it right from the snap store, I didn't have to compile anything.

@Realjohndoe: I should also point out that I'm using 32bit TwisterOS from raspbian-x.com Anything for 64bit pi4 is pretty much useless right now and it's just a pointless thing to install, there are no 64bit apps that are even going to take advantage of the 64bit architecture fully or use the full ram.
